title: The Final KFGD of 2022!! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.16.22
description:

Blessing and Tim celebrate the FINAL Kinda Funny Games Daily of the year by talking Ash's Pokemon journey coming to an end, Guerilla confirming plans for a multiplayer Horizon game, and Kojima teasing a new game.
